title: Day 32 : 15 August 2002 (17 entries)
content: I like the use of word play in 32.007
author: alex

comments.content:
I'm a bit lost on 32009.   
   
to me it reads typophilelytophpli.com   
or it could read   
tppieyohl.com   
   
in which manner does this make up the word typophle, are there characters that are simply decorative that I can't figure out?
the nipples one is surely the most disgusting shirt of the contest. Congrats to that person.

I would like 32016 without the "El"   
   
Joe, I still don't see my submit up :/

Poor Joe.   
If the winner is getting $250, I think he should get $1000.   
   
hhp

Silly Hrant. It won't help to shine Joe's shoes. He's not a judge.   
   
And I agree with Alejandro on the 'El'. Spanish or no, that is a   
beautiful tee (sans blood, too).

So far, 32.016 is the single shirt that I have even come close to consider actually buying and wearing. However, the 'Ël' and the accent over the 'ó' hurt my eyes. A lot. You'd think typophiles of all people would care about not abusing the letters of non-American languages...
